definition.text: Please, do not be surprised to find an under construction sign here and there...

paragraphs.text: As I mentioned earlier, Superalgos is constantly growing, and infrastructure architected for the upcoming version may occasionally be merged to the current version in a service pack, along with necessary fixes and minor improvements.
If you are curious about what is cooking for the upcoming Superalgos release, join the Superalgos Develop Telegram group.
